person.name: Christoffel Golden Jr.
person.description: Elder Christoffel Golden, Jr. was sustained a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on March 31, 2001. Previously, he served in the Third Quorum of the Seventy as an Area Authority Seventy for the Africa Southeast Area, and also as an Area Authority, Area Authority Seventy, and counselor in the Africa Area. He has served as president of the Africa Southeast Area, counselor in the Africa West Area, and is currently assigned to Church headquarters in Salt Lake City.
